Title: Occupe-toi d'Amélie..!
Writer: Georges Feydeau (play), Jean Aurenche (adaptation), Pierre Bost (adaptation)
Actors: Danielle Darrieux, Jean Desailly, Victor Guyau, Grégoire Aslan
Plot: Once a lowly chambermaid, Amelie Pochet now revels as the pampered mistress of a military man named Etienne.
